tool_description: Segments customers based on their feedback sentiment patterns and characteristics to identify different customer satisfaction groups.

customer_data.description: Customer feedback data with sentiment scores

segmentation_method.description: Segmentation approach: sentiment_based, frequency_based, or combined

error_messages: Insufficient customer data: Provide at least 10 customer records for segmentation.
Invalid number of segments: Must be between 2 and 10.
Incomplete customer data: Each customer record must include ID and sentiment information.
usage: Input customer data with sentiment information and configure segmentation parameters. Returns customer segments with characteristics and insights.

segment_sizes.description: Number of customers in each segment

recommended_actions.description: Recommended actions for each customer segment
